channel.title: Quick Chat Icon
channel.description: Okay so i just added the simple quick chat through clicking a skill in the skill menu how could i add the little quick chat icon that runescape has i have the sprite or image but how could i add it so that when someone clicks a skill and it says the quick chat of what there level is it has the quick chat icon besides it...
